fields.title: Mid-Century Modern Dining Set - Walnut
fields.description: Authentic 1960s dining table with 6 chairs in excellent condition. Solid walnut construction with original upholstery recently restored.

fields.title: KitchenAid Stand Mixer - Professional 600
fields.description: Heavy-duty KitchenAid Professional 600 in pearl white. Includes dough hook, wire whip, and flat beater. Lightly used, works perfectly.

fields.title: Weber Genesis II Gas Grill - Stainless Steel
fields.description: Premium gas grill with 3 burners, side tables, and warming rack. Excellent condition with cover included. Perfect for outdoor entertaining.

fields.title: Vintage Persian Rug - Hand Knotted 8x10
fields.description: Beautiful hand-knotted Persian rug with intricate patterns. Professionally cleaned, excellent condition. Adds elegance to any room.

fields.title: Teak Outdoor Furniture Set - Table + 4 Chairs
fields.description: High-quality teak outdoor dining set. Weather-resistant and naturally beautiful. Includes cushions and umbrella. Minor weathering adds character.
